title: The leaked flat Apple Watch from last year could become the Series 8
content:
The Apple Watch is a great device for both fitness and non-health-related features. Every year, the company behind it continues to make tweaks to it. As a result, this wearable has evolved from a thick-bezeled device to a stylish luxury item that lives on our wrists. We’ve been hearing about the Cupertino tech giant’s upcoming

The post The leaked flat Apple Watch from last year could become the Series 8 appeared first on XDA.
description: According to a new report, the leaked flat Apple Watch from last year could become the Series 8. We will likely see it this upcoming fall.
